TabSpace - Split Tab Manager revolutionizes your browsing experience by enabling efficient multitasking right in your browser. Perfect for researchers, developers, writers, and anyone who needs to view multiple web pages simultaneously.

Key Features:
âœ¨ Dynamic Split Screen
â€¢ Split your browser window into multiple adjustable panels
â€¢ Drag panel borders to resize them according to your needs
â€¢ Support for multiple tabs in split view
â€¢ Smooth and responsive panel adjustments

ğŸ¯ Smart Tab Management
â€¢ Choose which tabs to include in split view
â€¢ Option to close original tabs when splitting
â€¢ Automatically restore original tabs when closing split view
â€¢ Maintain your workflow with intuitive tab organization

âš¡ Efficient Workflow
â€¢ Compare content side by side
â€¢ Copy and reference information between panels
â€¢ Perfect for research, shopping comparison, and content creation
â€¢ Boost your productivity with organized workspace

ğŸ”’ Privacy & Security
â€¢ Works completely offline
â€¢ No data collection or tracking
â€¢ Minimal permissions required
â€¢ Open source for transparency

Common Use Cases:
â€¢ Research: Compare multiple sources side by side
â€¢ Shopping: Compare products from different websites
â€¢ Development: View documentation while coding
â€¢ Writing: Reference sources while creating content
â€¢ Translation: Work with original and translated text simultaneously
â€¢ Social Media: Monitor multiple feeds at once

Tips:
â€¢ Use the panel resizer to adjust the width of each section
â€¢ Close individual panels when no longer needed
â€¢ Right-click on the extension icon to access quick settings
â€¢ Customize your split layout based on your workflow

Get TabSpace today and transform the way you browse the web!
